<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a8c21c6dda4c7cfb40fc54ff0fc7e5e3f"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a8c21c6dda4c7cfb40fc54ff0fc7e5e3f">isBBPendingDeletion</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a7962416c960380f3b76c88e536514a1a">BasicBlockT</a> &#42;DelBB)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///@&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\name Mutation APIs</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// These methods provide APIs for submitting updates to the DomTreeT and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the PostDominatorTree.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Note: There are two strategies to update the DomTreeT and the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// PostDominatorTree:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 1 Eager UpdateStrategy: Updates are submitted and then flushed</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// immediately.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 2 Lazy UpdateStrategy: Updates are submitted but only flushed when you</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// explicitly call Flush APIs. It is recommended to use this update strategy</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// when you submit a bunch of updates multiple times which can then</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// add up to a large number of updates between two queries on the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// DomTreeT. The incremental updater can reschedule the updates or</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// decide to recalculate the dominator tree in order to speedup the updating</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// process depending on the number of updates.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Although GenericDomTree provides several update primitives,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// it is not encouraged to use these APIs directly.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Notify DTU that the entry block was replaced.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Recalculate all available trees and flush all BasicBlocks</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// awaiting deletion immediately.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#ab6ae3c90eff5a8a46fe9ed9909e7d3cd"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FuncT&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#ab6ae3c90eff5a8a46fe9ed9909e7d3cd">recalculate</a>(FuncT &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Submit updates to all available trees.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The Eager Strategy flushes updates immediately while the Lazy Strategy</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// queues the updates.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Note: The &quot;existence&quot; of an edge in a CFG refers to the CFG which DTU is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// in sync with + all updates before that single update.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// CAUTION!</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 1 It is required for the state of the LLVM IR to be updated</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#42;before&#42; submitting the updates because the internal update routine will</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// analyze the current state of the CFG to determine whether an update</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// is valid.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 2 It is illegal to submit any update that has already been submitted,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// i.e., you are supposed not to insert an existent edge or delete a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// nonexistent edge.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a363d442ff7f9a13eafaee275aad9f54c"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a363d442ff7f9a13eafaee275aad9f54c">applyUpdates</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;UpdateT&gt;</a> Updates);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Apply updates that the critical edge (FromBB, ToBB) has been</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// split with NewBB.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#abb620d887e5e200028c5e0fb37f82592"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#abb620d887e5e200028c5e0fb37f82592">splitCriticalEdge</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a7962416c960380f3b76c88e536514a1a">BasicBlockT</a> &#42;FromBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a7962416c960380f3b76c88e536514a1a">BasicBlockT</a> &#42;ToBB,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a7962416c960380f3b76c88e536514a1a">BasicBlockT</a> &#42;NewBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Submit updates to all available trees. It will also</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 1 discard duplicated updates,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 2 remove invalid updates. (Invalid updates means deletion of an edge that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// still exists or insertion of an edge that does not exist.)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The Eager Strategy flushes updates immediately while the Lazy Strategy</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// queues the updates.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Note: The &quot;existence&quot; of an edge in a CFG refers to the CFG which DTU is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// in sync with + all updates before that single update.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// CAUTION!</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 1 It is required for the state of the LLVM IR to be updated</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#42;before&#42; submitting the updates because the internal update routine will</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// analyze the current state of the CFG to determine whether an update</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// is valid.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 2 It is illegal to submit any update that has already been submitted,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// i.e., you are supposed not to insert an existent edge or delete a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// nonexistent edge.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 3 It is only legal to submit updates to an edge in the order CFG changes</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// are made. The order you submit updates on different edges is not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// restricted.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a28512659006140e4ac78ee3a68043dd5"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a28512659006140e4ac78ee3a68043dd5">applyUpdatesPermissive</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;UpdateT&gt;</a> Updates);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///@&#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///@&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\name Flush APIs</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// CAUTION! By the moment these flush APIs are called, the current CFG needs</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// to be the same as the CFG which DTU is in sync with + all updates</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// submitted.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Flush DomTree updates and return DomTree.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// It flushes Deleted BBs if both trees are up-to-date.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// It must only be called when it has a DomTree.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a0ec32b69ca3c12883ee03ad1c2bd92d9"><Highlight kind="normal">  DomTreeT &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a0ec32b69ca3c12883ee03ad1c2bd92d9">getDomTree</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Flush PostDomTree updates and return PostDomTree.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// It flushes Deleted BBs if both trees are up-to-date.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// It must only be called when it has a PostDomTree.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a43c80a160270d75d99cfeb080c165694"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#a43c80a160270d75d99cfeb080c165694">flush</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Debug method to help view the internal state of this class.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#aefa1d7d67dd758fb993876e62c56890d"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#aa863693eef567397d9c292da5bf22d34">LLVM&#95;DUMP&#95;METHOD</a> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericdomtreeupdater/#aefa1d7d67dd758fb993876e62c56890d">dump</a>() </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">protected</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Helper structure used to hold all the basic blocks</Highlight></CodeLine>
